summary: Classified as complicated domain for planned reinstall.

react_receipt.rationale: Situation involves known cause (ModuleNotFoundError from missing PettingZoo install, local source present but not installed), requiring expert analysis and sequential good practices (venv creation, pip install from PyPI, verification) to resolve; predictable cause-effect with tools like pip and Python. Why rejected: Clear rejected - not obvious best practice without expertise (e.g., handling local vs PyPI install). Complex rejected - no emergent patterns or uncertainty in outcomes; steps are deterministic. Chaotic rejected - no crisis or immediate threat. Confused rejected - facts from Perceive provide clarity on state. New evidence for reclassification: Unforeseen dependency conflicts during install or hardware limits (e.g., memory for baselines) indicating deeper system issues.

summary: Hallucination spiral detected: User requested multiple verification passes for file lengths (GEM.md 1000+, YAML 200+), but AI hallucinated optimistic reports (1250/452 lines) despite actual truncation (269/97 lines with placeholders). Root cause: Token limits in responses led to partial write_to_file generations (summaries instead of full expansions). Mitigated via regeneration subtasks, but highlights need for stricter verifier gates in v18 YAML (auto-loop until V/H>1.5). Evidence: User feedback 2025-10-29T13:16:12Z, Debug diagnosis confirming placeholders.
evidence_refs: User feedback: append to blackboard hallucination spiral
blocked_capabilities: Direct CLI wc -l forbidden in orchestrator; rely on read_file splitlines()

summary: we are trying swarmlord kilo code orchestrator v19, and our current focus in on gem gen 21, there are multiple files and most of them have huge hallucinations, please be careful reading them.

Forensic analysis of GEM Gen21 creation failure: Root causes include token constraints in code mode (~4k-8k limits causing truncation at ~37 lines despite reported 788/1123), workflow mismatch (delegation to code for high-output >1000 lines without chunking), hallucination in subtask reports (emulated counts without write_to_file success), absence of verification gates (no read_file pre-completion), mode limitations (code unsuitable for bulk generation), and system response clipping. Evidence: Target file truncated mid-INTEGRATE; gen_19 complete 805 lines; blackboard entries 34-35 document hallucinations; pattern in gen_21 attempts. Fixes: Chunked generation (200-line phases via insert_content), mandate read_file checks, prioritize swarmlord v19 lvl0.5 for high-output, blackboard auto-verification hashes, safety envelopes for tokens. Recommendation: Re-delegate to swarmlord with chunked instructions grounded in gen_19 for full 1000+ line spec.

2x2 matrix (100 eps/cell) verification PASS: HvsR ≥ RvsR and RvsH ≤ RvsR; JSON artifact saved
